column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant | Participants # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=I flew in an airplane for the first time when I was eight years old .
#id=2
#text=I was on my way to Disney World .
#id=3
#text=I was very nervous and was n't sure what to expect !
#id=4
#text=I sat down next to my mom and she explained what would happen .
#id=5
#text=She told me the flight attendant would talk to us about safety but that air travel was very safe and I should worry .
#id=6
#text=Then she told me that we were getting ready to take off !
#id=7
#text=She told me we 'd go up in the air and then the wheels would retract .
#id=8
#text=I was relieved to know what that sound was when I heard it , otherwise I would have been nervous !
#id=9
#text=It was a smooth flight and soon we were in Florida !
#text=I noticed we were starting to go lower .
#text=My mom gave me some gum to help relieve the pressure in my ears .
#text=I heard the wheels come back down and soon we had landed !
